message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  I know it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $11,500, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
